  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class BuilderActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements SaveDialogFragment.SaveDialogListener, LoadDialogFragment.LoadDialogListener, NewRoomDialogFragment.NewRoomDialogListener, NewIODialogFragment.NewIODialogListener, NewInterestDialogFragment.NewInterestDialogListener
    Controller handling logic for the level builder
    Author:
    Alexandre ANDRE, Dylan BANCE, Remy BARBOSA, Houmam WEHBEH

      • onDialogPositiveClick

        public void onDialogPositiveClick(NewIODialogFragment dialog,
                         Room from,
                         int directionFrom,
                         Room to,
                         int directionTo,
                         boolean twoWay)
        Handles the OK button when trying to add a new IO through dialog Adds the IO to the maze if everything is OK Shows a toast and recalls the dialog if the IO is a loop on the same room
        Specified by:
        onDialogPositiveClick in interface NewIODialogFragment.NewIODialogListener
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog fragment created
        from - The room where the IO starts
        directionFrom - The position of the IO on the room
        to - The room where the IO ends
        directionTo - The position of the IO on the room
        twoWay - Defines if the IO a two-way IO
